sentences.sentence: It is impossible to conceive of a self arising outside of social experience.
sentences.translation: 我们不可能设想一个在社会经验之外产生的自我。（自我和社会是密不可分的。）

sentences.sentence: Not all problems arising from social discrimination can be addressed through communication.
sentences.translation: 并不是所有由社会歧视引起的问题都可以通过沟通来解决。

sentences.sentence: He faced charges arising from alleged financial irregularities.
sentences.translation: 他面临涉嫌不正当财务行为的控告。
